trans-unit.source: Represents the execution environment of an activity that is being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 중단 중인 활동의 실행 환경을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors that create activities that are derived from <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601> can override <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601.Abort%2A> to take action in response to being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 활동을 만드는 사용자 지정 활동 작성자 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>재정의할 수 <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601.Abort%2A>중단에 대 한 응답에 어떤 작업도.</xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601.Abort%2A> </xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that interacts with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> might want to call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A> if the activity is being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 상호 작용 하는 활동 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>호출 하는 경우가 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A>작업이 중단 되는 경우.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Exception> that contains the reason for the activity being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Exception>중단 되는 작업에 대 한 이유를 포함 하는.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An exception that contains the reason for the activity being aborted.
trans-unit.target: 중단 중인 활동에 대 한 이유를 포함 하는 예외입니다.
